text: CarGurus' vision is

to be the number one digital
destination for consumers
and dealers to conveniently buy
and sell any vehicle anywhere
with the best price and selection.
What we did was we developed this IMV
or Instant Market Value,

and what Instant Market Value
did was that was the tool

to bring that transparency to
the viewer, to tell the people
who were searching for cars whether
or not they were getting a good deal,
a great deal, or a bad deal.
We use Amazon SageMaker on AWS.
It powers all of our machine learning
and predictive insights.
We are using it to

also democratize data science
across our engineering org

to make sure that not just
seasoned experienced data

scientists have access to do
these data science type things,
but also these talented engineers
that we have all over our organization.
CarGurus is a data first company

and the way that we look
at generative AI is we need

to start using it, whether
we're using it internally
for increased efficiency and productivity
or whether we're using it externally

to help our consumers conveniently
search for whatever it is

that they're looking for in
the auto buying experience
and making it fit for them.
We've just scratched the surface
and we are going

to be leaning heavily
into this in the next
year, two years, three years.

I think generative AI
personally is, is going

to change the industry as a
whole, the technology industry,
and we are gonna embrace that.
